title: Knife, 17th century
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped blade with rounded bolster. Tapered handle, ivory decorated with brass; three steel rivets on handle, brass mounts.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, 17th century.
17th century. steel, ivory, brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-60.
